javafx.scene.input

Class KeyCombination.Modifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.input.KeyCombination.Modifier
  • Enclosing class:
    KeyCombination

    public static final class KeyCombination.Modifier
extends Object
    This class represents a pair of modifier key and its value.
    Since:
    JavaFX 2.0
